text: (merkurappatta) ivai namatu urutimikka atarankalakum. Iprahim tan makkalait (tarkkattil) velvatarkaka, nam ivarrai avarukkuk (karruk) kotuttom. Nam virumpiyavarkalin patavikalai nam evvalavo uyartti vitukirom. (Napiye!) Niccayamaka umatu iraivan mika nanamutaiyavan, mikunta arivutaiyavan avan
